sentences.en: ...the bums on the corner fighting over beers.
sentences.cn: …在街角争抢啤酒的流浪者们。

sentences.en: A man pinched her bum on the train so she hit him.
sentences.cn: 在火车上有人捏她屁股,她打了那人.

sentences.en: Can I bum a cigarette off you ?
sentences.cn: 可以向您要支烟 吗 ?

sentences.en: He dropped out of college and became a beach bum.
sentences.cn: 他从大学退学,整天在海滩闲逛.

sentences.en: He got some very bum reports from his commanders.
sentences.cn: 他从司令官那里获得了一些不符合事实的报告.

sentences.en: He knows you're getting a bum deal.
sentences.cn: 他知道你在做一笔烂生意。

sentences.en: He spent several years on the bum.
He tried to bum a ride.
sentences.cn: 他试图求别人让他搭顺风车.

sentences.en: I called the umpire a bum.
sentences.cn: 我认为裁判是个不中用的家伙.

sentences.en: I think it is a bum novel.
sentences.cn: 我认为那是一本蹩脚的小说.

sentences.en: If you don't get a move on, I'll bum this boat!
sentences.cn: 快来, 不出来我烧掉你们这只船!

sentences.en: It didn't dawn on me that I was getting the bum's rush.
sentences.cn: 我不明白,我竟要被赶走.

sentences.en: John lost his job and went on the bum.
sentences.cn: 约翰失业后过着流浪生活.

sentences.en: Mind if I bum a cigarette?
The penniless man had to bum a ride home.
sentences.cn: 那个身无分文的人只好乞求搭车回家.

sentences.en: What's new in the bum's comforter?
sentences.cn: 报纸上有什么新闻 吗 ?
